Name: mummification
About the game: mummification - Fight ravenous mummies and cooperate with your AI teammates to survive ! The Player can carry Two Weapons at once and Switch them HealthBar Indicator Smooth zooming while Aiming Camera Shake while Shooting Proximity Bombs First Aid Explosive Barrels Full support for XBOX Controller - OR - Keyboard/Mouse The Game Uses Advanced A.I. for Your Squad and the Mummies The Boss Level Mummies are Faster and Stronger Several Weapon Types to Choose from Enemy Markers so they can be located anywhere on the Map Can You Find the Hidden 'Easter Egg' ? Make sure to Protect Your Squad and Keep up Your health using First Aid Kits, For an Extra Challenge : If You Die, The Game Re-Starts ! Thanks to the Power of Unreal Engine You have a Vast Game Map to Explore You have to Survive in this Mummy Shoot 'em Up to Win the Day and Save Egypt The type of game is a Third Person Squad Survival Shooter Genre. Here are the features and content a customer can expect to be included with their purchase . . . Essentially, what You can expect to get with Your purchase . . . Fight ravenous mummies and cooperate with your AI teammates to survive ! The Player can carry Two Weapons at once and Switch them HealthBar Indicator Smooth zooming while Aiming Camera Shake while Shooting Proximity Bombs, You can set and the Enemy will activate when they walk near it First Aid Kits Explosive Barrels Full support for XBOX Controller - OR - Keyboard/Mouse The Game Uses Advanced A.I. for Your Squad and the Mummies The Boss Level Mummies are Faster and Stronger Several Weapon Types to Choose from Enemy Markers so they can be located anywhere on the Map
